info.title: CATHOLIC QUIZ API | Stable Shield Solutions
info.description: Backend for the Catholic Quiz project. Powered by Stable Shield Solutions

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Create a diocese and assign a diocesan admin. Requires JWT authentication.

message.example: Diocese created and email sent to Diocese Admin

get.description: Verify a user's email by clicking the link sent to their email

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user to verify

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Email verification token sent to the user

post.description: Resend the verification email to a user who has not yet verified their email.
Partially update the profile of the diocese linked to the authenticated user. Fields are optional. Requires JWT authentication.

403.description: No diocese linked to this account

message.example: No diocese linked to this account
The logo must be an image.

items.example: The logo must be a file of type: png, jpg, jpeg.

post.description: Create a new school under the logged-in diocesan admin's diocese and assign a school admin. Requires JWT authentication.

message.example: School created and email sent to School Admin

403.description: User does not belong to any diocese

message.example: Logged-in user does not belong to any diocese
The name has already been taken.

post.description: Partially update the school profile linked to the authenticated school admin. All fields are optional. Requires JWT authentication.

403.description: No school linked to this account

message.example: No school linked to this account
The email has already been taken.

post.description: Allows a school admin to create a learner and automatically generates a learner user account using the provided email.

email.description: Learner email provided by the school

get.description: Retrieve all dioceses nationwide with their associated schools. Accessible only to Super Admin users.

message.example: You are not authorized to perform this action.

get.summary: Get a single diocese by ID
get.description: Returns a single diocese with its schools and learners

put.description: Partially update a diocese by its ID. All fields are optional. Requires JWT authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the diocese to update

message.example: The name has already been taken.

delete.description: Deletes a diocese by its ID. Requires JWT authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the diocese to delete

get.description: Fetches all schools belonging to a specific diocese, including their learners.

delete.description: Deletes a school and all related learners and user accounts. This action is irreversible.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the school to delete

get.summary: Get schools and learners for the authenticated diocesan admin
get.description: Retrieves all schools under the diocesan admin's diocese, with paginated learners for each school. Requires JWT authentication and 'diocesan_admin' role.

post.summary: Update a School within a Diocese
post.description: Allows a diocesan admin to update a school within their diocese. All fields are optional. Requires JWT authentication.

parameters.name: schoolId
parameters.description: ID of the school to update

404.description: School not found in your diocese

message.example: School not found in your diocese
The email has already been taken.

delete.summary: Delete a school within the authenticated diocese
delete.description: Allows a diocesan admin to delete a school that belongs to their diocese. This will also delete learners, associated user accounts, and the school logo if it exists.

parameters.name: schoolId
parameters.description: ID of the school to delete

404.description: School not found in your diocese

message.example: School not found in your diocese

get.description: Returns a paginated list of learners belonging to the authenticated school admins school.

403.description: No school linked to this account

message.example: No school linked to this account

get.description: Retrieve a single learner belonging to the authenticated school.

403.description: No school linked to this account

message.example: No school linked to this account

404.description: Learner not found or access denied

message.example: Learner not found or access denied

post.description: Allows the authenticated school admin to update a learner's details. All fields are optional. Supports image upload.

parameters.name: learnerId
parameters.description: ID of the learner to update

403.description: No school linked to this account

message.example: No school linked to this account
The photo must be an image.

delete.description: Deletes a learner linked to the authenticated school. Also removes the learner's user account if it exists.

parameters.name: learnerId
parameters.description: ID of the learner to delete

403.description: No school linked to this account

message.example: No school linked to this account

get.description: Retrieves the profile of the authenticated learner, including associated school details.

404.description: No learner profile linked to this account

message.example: No learner profile linked to this account

post.description: Resets the password of a learner to a default value ('123456'). Only accessible by the authenticated school admin.

parameters.name: learnerId
parameters.description: ID of the learner whose password is to be reset

403.description: No school linked to this account

message.example: No school linked to this account

get.summary: Get a specific school within the authenticated diocesan admin's diocese
get.description: Retrieves a specific school by its ID, ensuring it belongs to the diocesan admin's diocese. Requires JWT authentication and 'diocesan_admin' role.

parameters.name: schoolId
parameters.description: ID of the school to retrieve

403.description: No diocese linked to this account

message.example: No diocese linked to this account

404.description: School not found in your diocese

message.example: School not found in your diocese

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to change their password by providing the current password and a new password. Requires JWT authentication.

422.description: Validation error or incorrect current password

get.summary: Get a single learner by ID
get.description: Returns a learner belonging to the authenticated user's school

403.description: No school linked to this account

message.example: No school linked to this account

get.summary: Get total schools and learners in a particular diocese
get.description: Returns the total number of schools and total learners for the specified diocese by ID

post.summary: Create a new Education Secretary for the logged-in diocesan admin
post.description: Creates a new Education Secretary associated with the diocese of the logged-in diocesan admin.

name.description: Full name of the Education Secretary

email.description: Email address of the Education Secretary

years_of_service.description: Number of years served in education

403.description: Logged-in user does not belong to any diocese

message.example: Logged-in user does not belong to any diocese

put.summary: Update an Education Secretary by ID (Diocesan Admin only)
put.description: Allows a diocesan admin to update an Education Secretary that belongs to their diocese.

requestBody.description: Fields to update (send only the fields you want to change)

biography.example: Over 15 years of experience in educational administration.

403.description: User does not belong to any diocese

message.example: Logged-in user does not belong to any diocese

get.description: Fetch a single diocese with its schools, learners, and diocesan users.
Returns the total count of all dioceses. Accessible only by Super Admin.
Returns the total count of all schools. Accessible only by Super Admin.
Returns the total count of all learners. Accessible only by Super Admin.

get.summary: Get all dioceses with schools, learners, and education secretary
get.description: Allows a super admin to retrieve all dioceses including their schools, learners, and education secretary details. Requires JWT authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing JWT token

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a super admin

get.summary: Get a single learner by ID
get.description: Allows a Super Admin to retrieve an individual learner along with the associated school and diocese.

get.summary: Get a single school by ID
get.description: Allows a Super Admin to retrieve a school along with its associated diocese and learners.

diocese.description: The diocese this school belongs to

learners.description: List of learners in this school

401.description: Unauthorized. JWT token missing or invalid.

put.description: Allows a super admin to update a diocese by ID

get.description: Returns the diocese ID assigned to the currently authenticated user

404.description: User is not assigned to any diocese

message.example: User is not assigned to any diocese

get.summary: Get Education Secretary by ID (Diocesan Admin only)
get.description: Retrieve an Education Secretary by ID. Access is restricted to diocesan admins and limited to secretaries within the admin's diocese.

404.description: Education Secretary not found or access denied

message.example: Education Secretary not found or access denied

get.summary: Get total number of schools for diocesan admin
get.description: Returns the total number of schools associated with the authenticated diocesan admins diocese.

403.description: Forbidden  diocesan admin access only or no diocese linked

get.description: Returns the authenticated school admin ID and the school they are assigned to. Access is restricted to school admins only.

404.description: School admin is not assigned to any school

message.example: School admin is not assigned to any school

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's learner ID. Access is restricted to users with the learner role.

404.description: Learner profile not linked to this account

message.example: Learner profile not linked to this account

get.description: Returns dashboard data for an authenticated school admin including school details and statistics.

404.description: School not found or not assigned

get.description: Returns the authenticated learner's profile including school and diocese information.

404.description: Learner profile not found or not linked

get.summary: Filter dioceses by state and LGA (Super Admin only)
get.description: Allows a super admin to filter dioceses using optional state and LGA query parameters.

parameters.name: lga
parameters.description: Local Government Area to filter dioceses

get.description: Search dioceses and schools by name, province, state. Returns matching dioceses and schools.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Keyword to search for (diocese name, school name, province, state, LGA)

get.description: Allows super admin to get all schools for a specific diocese by providing diocese_id

parameters.name: diocese_id
parameters.description: ID of the diocese to filter schools

404.description: No schools found for this diocese

message.example: No schools found for this diocese

get.description: Allows super admin to search schools using their name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the school to search for

404.description: No schools found with that name

message.example: No schools found with that name

get.description: Allows super admin to filter dioceses by a creation date range
Allows super admin to filter schools by a creation date range
Allows super admin to retrieve all students. Filters by state, LGA, province, student name, parents' name, and creation date.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter students created after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter students created before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

get.summary: Search schools in the diocesan admin's diocese
get.description: Allows a diocesan admin to search for schools by name and email within their assigned diocese

403.description: Forbidden. Diocesan admin access only or no diocese linked

get.summary: Filter schools by state and LGA for diocesan admin
get.description: Allows diocesan admin to filter schools under their diocese by state and LGA

parameters.name: lga
parameters.description: Local Government Area of the school

403.description: Forbidden. Diocesan admin access only or no diocese linked

get.summary: Filter schools by date for diocesan admin
get.description: Allows diocesan admin to filter schools under their diocese by creation date

get.summary: Get all students under a diocese with search and date filtering
get.description: Allows a diocesan admin to retrieve all students under their diocese with optional search and date filters.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by student name, student email, parent name, or school name

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter students created from this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter students created up to this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

get.summary: Filter students in a school by name, email, or parent name
get.description: Allows a school admin to search students in their school using name, email, or parent name.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by student name, email, or parent name

get.summary: Filter students by state and local government
get.description: Allows a school admin to filter students in their school by state and local government of origin.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter by student's state of origin

parameters.name: lga
parameters.description: Filter by student's local government of origin

get.description: Allows a school admin to filter students in their school by registration date range.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter students registered from this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter students registered up to this date (YYYY-MM-DD)
